Articles.Content:
Crew vehicle Pulsar which fits three kerbal and Neutron which propels the craft to space.

![ASua4HF.png](http://i.imgur.com/ASua4HF.png)

Pulsar in orbit with panels deployed

![XbqCveq.png](http://i.imgur.com/XbqCveq.png)

Pulsar can be outfitted with science equipment to life support systems(if using mods).

Download:

[http://www./download/wv67viy8ya6vq84/Pulsar_With_KLS.craft](http://www./download/wv67viy8ya6vq84/Pulsar_With_KLS.craft)

P.S., Control from the docking port for proper navball and rocket directional control

P.P.S., Parachute is under docking port

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-11T05:43:35Z" title="09/11/2015 05:43  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 11, 2015</time> by Voyager275**
